id.comment: returns all variables in a procedure that calls wind

query.querystr: procedure p; variable v; Select p such that Calls(p, "wind") such that Uses(p, v)

id.comment: returns while and assignments that are in while loops, which modifies a variable with pattern w1-100 in RHS

query.querystr: if i; assign a; variable v; Select <i,a> such that Parent*(i,a) such that Modifies(a,"w1") pattern a (_, _"w1-100"_)
procedure p; assign a; variable v; if i; Select <i,a> such that Parent*(i, a) such that Uses(i,"speed") pattern a ("distance",_)

id.comment: variables in LHS of assignments that are in while loops

query.querystr: assign a; while w; variable v; Select v such that Modifies(a, v) such that Parent*(w, a)

id.comment: Variable in RHS of assignments that are in if loops

query.querystr: variable v; if i; assign a; Select v such that Uses(a, v) such that Parent(i, a) pattern a (_,_"w1"_)

id.comment: return variables that are read in procedures that calls wind

query.querystr: procedure p; assign a; variable v; read r; Select v such that Calls*(p, "wind") such that Modifies(r,v) such that Uses (p,v)

id.comment: return assignments and values that are in while loops with w2 in LHS

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; if i; Select <a,v> such that Modifies(a, v) such that Parent*(i, a) pattern a ("w2",_)

id.comment: returns while loops with an assignment with w2 in RHS that is in a while loop

query.querystr: assign a; if i; variable v; Select i pattern a (_,_"w2"_) such that Uses(i, "w2") such that Parent* (i, a)

id.comment: returns variable that is modified in a while loop with RHS pattern speed*2

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; while w; Select v such that Modifies(a,v) such that Parent(w,a) pattern a (_, _"speed*2"_)

id.comment: while loops which modifies s3 with an rhs with w2

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; if i; Select i such that Parent*(i, a) such that Modifies(i,"w1") pattern a (_,_"w2"_)

id.comment: procedures that have an assignment in a while loop that has temp in LHS

query.querystr: procedure p; assign a; while w; print pr; variable v; Select p such that Calls(p,"wind") such that Uses(pr,"temp") such that Uses(p,"temp")

id.comment: return while loops that have assignments and modifies variables with w2%50 at rhs

query.querystr: assign a; if i; variable v; Select a such that Parent*(i,a) such that Modifies(i,v) pattern a (_,_"w2%50"_)

id.comment: assignments that are in if loops and modifies a variable with speed in RHS

query.querystr: assign a; if i; variable v; Select a such that Modifies(a, "distance") such that Parent*(i, a) pattern a(_, _"speed"_)
